title: tips for becoming a pro?
body: haii im silver 5 mid lane player thats 11. i've been wondering if should become a pro gamer or just continue on school . My grades are not that bad but i still very love this game and should keep on enjoying this game for the rest of maybe life. I would very love alot of feedback any advice would be good :)

replies.body: go to my thread on how to be good and i'll give you lessons
